sentences.sContent: I had a flat tyre (= all the air went out of it ) on the way home.
sentences.sCn: 回家的路上我的轮胎瘪了。

sentences.sContent: The spare tyre ’s in the boot.

phrases.pCn: 子午线轮胎（等于radial-ply tyre，radial，radial tire）
气胎；空心轮胎；充气轮胎

remMethod.val: 轮胎(tyre)半途爆了， 又累(tire)又饿

trans.tranOther: a thick rubber ring that fits around the wheel of a car, bicycle etc
